mapper.insert: insert into tlicenceimage (sTransactionNum, sLicenceImageName, sUploadUserCode, sUploadUserName, sStorePath, sApprovalCode, sIdentifier, sBusinessCategory, sAccountType, sBankCode, sBankName) values (#{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slicenceimagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suploadusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suploadusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sstorepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sidentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbusinesscategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saccounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
